pos review: Location, decor, friendly, room amazing, great breakfast. Would definitely stay here again.
neg review: Smoking in courtyard smells went through to breakfast room

pos review: Lovely old fashioned style of the room

The location was very close to the city center. The hotel breakfast was excellent. The room was clean and met all expectations. Staff was very pleasant and helped with directions, restaurant recommendations, etc.
Staff were very pleasant and helpful.  Location couldn't be better. We had a very enjoyable stay and would recommend this hotel to anyone.
Choice of continental breakfast or eggs. All nice and fresh
neg review: The breakfast room is a little cramped

pos review: Great location, great breakfast, great ac!!!!
loved the location and room and very friendly staff.
